scripts.usemin: usemin contact-us.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact-us.html && usemin creative-ideas.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/creative-ideas.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin Amar-Ramesh-About.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/Amar-Ramesh-About.html && usemin Audi-Venkatesh-About.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/Audi-Venkatesh-About.html && usemin Avinash-Gowariker-About.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/Avinash-Gowariker-About.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
